title: Toy Girl
description: Set in the not-so-futuristic future Toy Girl is a story of an agency that sells human toys to wealthy young children. When seventeen-year-old Willow becomes the human toy of Tamara Mason, she begins to discover dark secrets about the agency she belongs to and slowly starts to remember who she really is... her name is not Willow and she has a brother that happens to be one of the toys as well. Can she regain enough of her memory to save herself and her brother? or will the boy she's falling for expose her to the agency before it is too late?
author: Viola Hart
